name: Alone (itch) (30phil1)
description:
You wake up to find...no one...

A game by Ezekiel "30phil1" Koontz

This game is a work in progress and is made in between of school and the throes of life as a high schooler. Heck, this game might never be done! Bare with me, I'll try my best to make a good story so give Alone a follow and keep up with development

Remember, Alone is ment to be a very somber experience and hardly even a game.

Oh yeah, there will be no background music.

Don't like itch.io? Download it on Gamejolt too!

THIS IS CURRENTLY IN AN UNFINISHED ALPHA STATE...So please don't yell at me :P
